title: 155 - Reconciling Faith and Politics Part 5 - Andy Strikes Back
description:
In this episode, Andy Lara joins in to discuss the current state of evangelicals and politics. We deal with a fantastic question about how to love and be united with people who disagree with us politically. 

Learn more about the VOX Podcast:
www.voxpodcast.com

Subscribe on iTunes - apple.co/1Lla1Nj
